sentence: Share this - Allan Smith 9h ago / 8:32 PM UTC GOP Rep. who voted to impeach Trump shares video of House evacuation Rep. Peter Meijer, R-Mich., posted to Twitter a video he shot from the House gallery as the chamber was being evacuated during the Capitol riot.
title: Jan. 6 Capitol riot: Full anniversary coverage

sentence: Others, like Michigan's PETER MEIJER and FRED UPTON, face Trump-backed candidates with steep uphill odds in new districts.
title: POLITICO Playbook: Harris declares unity,' while Zelenskyy accuses appeasement'
